content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. To get started with scheduling your HVAC service, could I please have your name?
Thanks Mary! Just a moment while I update your name in our system.
Oops, I'm having trouble updating your name in the system. I will get a human operator to assist. Please hold on.
reason: AI unable to update customer name

content: Hello Mary, this is Joe from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the delay. I will handle everything for you. Can you please confirm your address to start?
Sure, I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thanks for confirming, Mary. One moment while I check our service area... Good news! We do service your area. When would you ideally like our HVAC technician to come by?
Tomorrow morning would be perfect if you have availability.
Let me check the schedule for tomorrow morning... Yes, we have an opening at 9 AM or 11 AM. Which do you prefer?
Your appointment is set for tomorrow at 9 AM. We will send you a reminder the day before. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services, Mary!
